column4: Hey guys, I am defragging before I install unbuntu as a dual boot, and its taking forever, and I've lost like 7 or 8GB's of space im noticing as I check my C drive...why is that ?
does defragging eat up that much space or something, I dont get it
defragging does just that, it defragments the drive, it shouldn't cause the files to use more space, it should just put all the empty spaces out at the end of the drive if I understand correctly
ouch 5 hours of defragging and your not done? something wrong me thinks, thats not a massive drive
